articles.title: Greetings to Mexican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mexican President
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Enrique Pena Nieto, president of Mexico, on Friday on the 206th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president success in his work for defending the sovereignty of the country and for achieving stability and wellbeing of the people, expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to Mexican Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Mexican Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Friday sent a message of greeting to his Mexican counterpart Claudia Ruis Massieu Salinas on the 206th anniversary of the independence of Mexico.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow strong on the principle of equality and mutual benefits, wishing the foreign minister success in her work.

articles.title: DPRK Government Will Struggle for Common Interests of NAM Member Nations: DPRK FM
articles.content:
DPRK Government Will Struggle for Common Interests of NAM Member Nations: DPRK FM
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho made a speech at the ministerial meeting of the NAM held in Venezuela on September 15 and 16 prior to the 17th NAM summit.
					 He said: 
					
					 The delegation of the DPRK finds it very important to clearly reflect the stand of the NAM on enhancing its position and role as a powerful anti-war and peace-loving force today, thwarting the acts of imperialists to maintain and strengthen aggressive military blocs and struggling against all forms of aggression, interference, subordination and inequality.
					
					 Aggressive joint military exercises, use of force and threats continue to be committed against sovereignty, territorial integrity and independence of the NAM member states in violation of principles of the UN charter.
					
					 As for the large-scale United States-south Korea joint military exercises being conducted in south Korea several times every year against the DPRK, the exercises are unprecedented in terms of military and nuclear threats on one member country of the NAM by one imperialist power.    
					
					 It is because of this provocative and aggressive large-scale joint military exercises of the United States that the situation on the Korean peninsula is often falling into danger of out of control.     
					
					 By inflicting unreasonable sanctions on the NAM member states with no legal ground, while impartiality and justice are being ignored, the UN Security Council turned into a tool of high-handedness and arbitrariness of the United States.
					
					 On several occasions the Government of the DPRK made a request to the UN Security Council for an emergency meeting on the large-scale joint military exercises of the United States which are provocative and aggressive with grave threats to international peace and security but the Council turned away every time.  
					
					 On the other hand, the Security Council adopted and enforced a "resolution" which prohibits the nuclear tests and ballistic rocket launch of the DPRK.
					
					 It was inevitable that the DPRK made an option for nuclear armament after everything has been done for the safeguarding of the security of the country in the face of the consistent threats coming from the United States.
					
					 The United States and western countries are even abusing the UN Security Council to force their "democracy" and "standards for human rights" upon the NAM countries.
					
					 In order for the UN Security Council to work with impartiality, it is crucial that NAM countries within the council should undertake common actions.
					
					 Therefore when the NAM countries take joint action that means they can actually possess the power of veto.
					
					 From this viewpoint, the DPRK considers that an action should be taken to activate and decisively enhance the role of the NAM working group within the UN Security Council. 
					
					 The government of the DPRK will resolutely struggle for the common interests of the NAM countries and closely cooperate with them.

articles.title: Assistant Administrator of UNDP Leaves
articles.content:
Assistant Administrator of UNDP Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Haoliang Xu, assistant administrator and director, Regional Bureau for Asia and the Pacific, UNDP, and his party left here Friday.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- A vice director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party, a delegation of the Juche idea study organization of India left here Friday after visiting the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Departing earlier were a delegation of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies and the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK Embassy in Havana on September 9, the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Algerian President Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Algerian President Sends Large Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of the Democratic People's Republic of Algeria, sent a large floral basket to the DPRK Embassy in El-Djezair on September 8 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival Opens
articles.content:
15th Pyongyang International Film Festival Opens
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival opened with due ceremony at the Central Youth Hall Friday.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture and chairman of the festival organizing committee, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture and general director of the General Bureau of Film, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of film, working people in the city and foreign delegations and delegates and members of international jury.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and members of missions of international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches and officials in charge of culture relations of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Introduced at the ceremony were long feature films, documentary and short films and films for special show, which are presented to the festival.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam in an opening address expressed the belief that the festival would be successful amid sincere efforts and cooperation of all participants.
					
					 The flag of the festival was hoisted and members of international jury were introduced.
					
					 Yuri Mityushin, chairman of the International Jury Committee, in a congratulatory speech said that the committee will do its work well to direct efforts to consolidating the prestige of the Pyongyang International Film Festival.
					
					 The ceremony introduced prizes of the festival.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, they watched a feature film of the Russian Federation.
					
					 The organizing committee of the festival hosted a reception for the festival participants at Okryu Restaurant on the same day.

articles.title: More Joint Rallies of Service Members and Civilians Held
articles.content:
More Joint Rallies of Service Members and Civilians Held
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Joint rallies of service members and civilians separately took place on Friday in South Hwanghae Province, North Hwanghae Province, Jagang Province, Kangwon Province and Rason City in celebration of the successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 They were attended by officials of the local Party and power organs, working people's bodies, industrial establishments, farms and universities, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 The statement issued by the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK was read out and then congratulatory speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Speakers said that the successful nuclear warhead explosion test is making the whole country pleased.
					
					 Speakers called for waging a vigorous campaign to display single-minded unity in the drive for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province and create the Mallima speed, finishing the harvesting and threshing campaign in a short span of time and thereby concluding the 200-day campaign of loyalty with signal boost in grain production.
					
					 They underlined the need for the People's Army to intensify training in the same spirit as displayed by the anti-Japanese guerrillas in Mt. Paektu with the firm standpoint that it will win victory in the fight against the enemy.
					
					 They called for pushing forward the projects for registering more valuable research successes urgently required in defense industry and various fields of the national economy through a dynamic campaign for breaking through cutting-edge science and technology.
					
					 They called for exalting the honor of the contingent of brave young people in every worksite for building an economic power.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Makes Performance Tour of Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Makes Performance Tour of Ryanggang Province
 Hyesan, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup is giving performance tour in Ryanggang Province amid the great expectation and high applauses of the people in the province. 
					 Since they gave the first performance in Samjiyon on Sept. 7, the artistes gave performances in Hyesan City who are all out to implement the decision set forth at the 7th Congress of the Party.
					
					 The performances began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented the reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un and the faith and loyalty of all service personnel and people to display the honor of victors in the present general offensive.
					
					 The performances ended with epilogue "We'll Travel One Road Forever" which eulogized the revolutionary faith and will of all service personnel and people to bring earlier the cause of building a socialist power, trusting and following Kim Jong Un to the end. The performances were acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Devotion to People Is WPK's Mode of Existence
articles.content:
Devotion to People Is WPK's Mode of Existence
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) recently decided to halt major national projects such as the construction of Ryomyong Street and direct the spearhead of the ongoing 200-day campaign to the recovery efforts in the flood-hit northern part of the country. 
					 It is the priority work and basic duty of the WPK, the party of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, to take warm care of the people's living in a responsible manner.
					
					 In their lifetime Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had led the Party to serve only for the sake of the popular masses, always attaching top priority to their interests and wellbeing.
					
					 In 1970 when he was told that the construction of a new street was to start in the capital city of Pyongyang in cold January, Kim Il Sung gave an instruction that it should be delayed until April for the inhabitants' safe evacuation.
					
					 When visiting the Samsu Power Station under construction in March 2006, Kim Jong Il advised the officials concerned to give top priority to the evacuees' livelihood, saying that nothing is more important for the WPK than to protect the interests of the people. In March 2009 when inspecting the Huichon Power Station under construction, he stressed the importance to build new houses for the inhabitants around it before anything else.
					
					 Last year, the flood-stricken area of Rason City turned into a fairyland of socialism thanks to the energetic guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who regards it as the WPK's mode of existence to make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the people.
					
					 Under his guidance, the army and people of the DPRK will turn the northern part of the country, recently hit hard by unprecedented, strong wind and downpours, into a people's paradise at an early date.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Young Korean People to Turn out in Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Young Korean People to Turn out in Struggle for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article calls upon all the young Korean people in the north, the south and abroad to tide over the difficulties in the way of accomplishing the cause of national reunification, pool their efforts in the idea of By Our Nation Itself and turn out as one in the sacred and patriotic struggle to achieve the independent reunification, true to the highly important teachings given by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 All the young Korean people at home and abroad who love the country and the nation should thoroughly implement the noble plan of the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu for building a reunified power. Herein lies the genuine way of paving a wide avenue to national reunification and bringing about a new dawn of national prosperity.
					
					 For the young people to struggle for national independence and great national unity is an important requirement for fulfilling their honorable mission and role in shattering the interference and obstructions of foreign forces and victoriously advancing the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Solidarity and alliance are more important than anything else for all the young Korean people at home and abroad who should achieve the historic cause of national reunification and they should boost solidarity and alliance despite manifold difficulties.
					
					 The young people who truly love the nation and desire reunification should deeply enshrine the immortal great programmes for reunification and valiantly turn out in the patriotic struggle for implementing them.
					
					 No matter what stern ordeals and no matter what big difficulties may lie in the way of the movement for national reunification, the cause of independent reunification is sure to emerge victorious as there are the great programmes for national reunification clearly indicating the way of the nation and the passionate youth whole-heartedly upholding them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Sinister Aim Sought by U.S. in Floating Story about "Nuclear Domino"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Sinister Aim Sought by U.S. in Floating Story about "Nuclear Domino"
Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. administration is busy building up world public opinion about the danger of Japan's and south Korean puppet forces' development of nuclear weapons in a bid to deter the DPRK from bolstering its nuclear force, according to reports of the U.S. and Western media.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					As regards the legitimate countermeasures for self-defense taken by the DPRK, sovereign state, the U.S. is making profound confusing of right and wrong, claiming those measures caused a domino effect in nuclear weaponization. This is no more than an intrigue of robbers skilful in shifting the blame on to others.
					
					The U.S.-touted "nuclear domino effect" is nothing but a cynical ploy to divert to the DPRK the international criticism of the former, the largest nuclear weapons state chiefly responsible for proliferating nuclear weapons.
					
					The U.S. is the arch criminal that transferred nuclear weapons technology to other countries in breach of the spirit of the NPT and has steadily threatened and blackmailed non-nuclear weapons states in a bid to realize its ambition for hegemony.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to stop talking about someone's development of nuclear weapons and find in its hostile policy toward the DPRK an answer to the question as to why the non-nuclear weapons state emerged a nuclear weapons state.
					
					It was the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons and opt for counteraction for preemptive attack.
					
					It is the final conclusion drawn by the DPRK that the nuclear stick-brandishing imperialists should be dealt with nukes only.
					
					With no intrigue can the U.S. conceal its true colors as the chieftain of nuclear proliferation.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Japanese Reactionaries' Anti-Chongryon Campaign
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Taken aback by the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test for self-defense, the Japanese reactionaries are getting frantic with campaign against the DPRK and Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The chief executive of Japan cried out for ratcheting up sanctions against the DPRK and the ruling and opposition parties agreed to adopt a "resolution critical of north Korea" at the Houses of Representatives and Councilors.
					
					 All papers and TVs of Japan are busy airing programs accusing the DPRK in a bid to rapidly build up public opinion critical of the DPRK. Against this backdrop right-wing gangsters of Japan have flocked to the Central Hall of Chongryon since Sept. 9 to perpetrate all sorts of hooliganism.
					
					 They brought dozens of loudspeaker vans around the hall to spout endless litany of such invectives that north Korea's ballistic rockets fell on exclusive economic zone of Japan, Tokyo condemns north Korea's nuclear warhead explosion test and it would expel Chongryon from Japan, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere there.
					
					 Groups of more than 10 gangsters attempted to break into the hall, a sign of persistent threat and blackmail against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Such ceaseless hooliganism is nothing but a ruckus of those much scared by the DPRK's might increasing as the days go by under the banner of Songun as it is a clear manifestation of the Japanese reactionaries' persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that it is a deliberate and premeditated politically-motivated provocation aimed to incite the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK in the whole Japanese society by tarnishing the prestige and image of Chongryon, overseas Koreans organization of the DPRK, and intensifying persecution and pressure upon it.
					
					 With nothing can the Japanese reactionaries cover up their anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon campaign as they have intentionally and systematically patronized the hooliganism of the right-wing gangsters under the guise of "people's sentiment."
					
					 The Korean people can hardly repress their towering resentment at the Japanese reactionaries who are painting themselves as "victims" and exploiting their campaign for intensifying the suppression of Chongryon, oblivious of the idea of making apology and reparation for the hideous crimes the Japanese imperialists committed against the Koreans in the past.
					
					 Suppression of Chongryon can never be pardoned as it is another wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to this repressive campaign but resolutely counter the Japanese reactionaries' despicable politically-motivated terrorism and persistent crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should be held fully responsible for the right-wing gangsters' hooliganism, stop the ceaseless provocations and sternly punish those responsible for it.
					
					 The DPRK will closely watch the behavior of the Japanese authorities.

articles.title: Scandals of South Korean Military Authorities
articles.content:
Scandals of South Korean Military Authorities
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Why are the south Korean puppet forces going reckless with the confrontation with fellow countrymen?
					 What are they compelled to go mad with confrontation and war hysteria?
					
					 One can get the answer in the fact that the shocking scandals are stunning all people in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military authorities were busying filling their purses when purchasing new-type "loudspeakers against the north" needed for the psychological smear campaign against it for the purpose of additionally setting up them in the whole areas along the Military Demarcation Line (MDL) in order to incite distrust, hostility, antagonism and confrontation with the north.
					
					 The south Korean military authorities spent a huge amount of taxes worth of 18.3 billion won in order to set up 40 new type "loudspeakers against the north" in more than 10 places of the whole areas along the MDL.
					
					 What matters is that those of the psychological warfare team of the puppet Defense Ministry set appraisal standard pursuant to the loudspeaker production in April and gave preferential right to a special business group under the groundless pretexts and received a fabulous amount of fund from it.
					
					 Everyone from the upper to the lower of the puppet army is involved in irregularities and corruption ranging from military equipment and supplies to the foodstuff of the puppet army soldiers.
					
					 In a word, the puppet military have turned into a big cesspool. In the long run, they regard confrontation with the fellow countrymen as means for accumulating wealth.
					
					 The puppet military hooligans are talking about "threat and provocation from the north" while worsening the north-south relations and creating confrontation with the fellow countrymen. This proves once again that it is the trite method for their despicable self-interests and existence.
					
					 An ill deed cannot bring honor. This is fit for traitor Park Geun Hye and the puppet military hooligans who commit evil things hurting the fellow countrymen and prolong their remaining days through irregularities and corruption.

articles.title: Fascist Crackdown upon Korean Scholar in U.S. Slammed
articles.content:
Fascist Crackdown upon Korean Scholar in U.S. Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet prosecution took such fascist action as demanding three years in prison and three years of suspension of qualifications for Prof. Kim Sang Il, Korean scholar in the U.S., on the charge of violation of the "Security Law" (SL) on Sept. 12, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The prosecution referred him to a court, charging that he contributed to Jaju Sibo and Tongil News articles related to the national reunification and the history of anti-Japanese movement.
					
					  At the trial the prosecution accused him of getting touch with compatriots in Europe and Japan in a bid to bring the charges of violation of "meeting and communication" of the SL to him. 
					
					 Kim in a phone interview with the paper denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for its serious lack of understanding of human rights.

articles.title: Evasion of Military Service among Senior Officials Prevails in S. Korea
articles.content:
Evasion of Military Service among Senior Officials Prevails in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Evasion of military service is rife among senior officials of south Korea, says the south Korean internet paper Asia Economy on Sept. 11.
					  According to the results of the survey made of information available from the puppet Military Service Agency by a lawmaker from an opposition party, the rate of exemption from military service among public officials of four degrees and above and their children has been 29 times that among ordinary people during the recent five years.
					
					 This evasion of military service is sparking off uproar among people of various circles in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Accuses Puppet Group of Justifying Organized Crime
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Accuses Puppet Group of Justifying Organized Crime
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on September 13 accused the puppet group of justifying the criminal act of cracking down on the all-out action of people with violence last year.
					 The editorial said that police at a hearing probing the act of cracking down upon peasant Paek Nam Gi with water cannon during an all-people action last year acted just like a thief crying "Stop thief!" only to spark off resentment.
					
					 Lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" were keen on hyping the "violent nature" and "illegality" of the above-said all-out action, it charged.
					
					 Aiming water cannon at the head of the peasant was a violence perpetrated by the authorities, it held.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Russia, China, Mongolia, Cambodia, Iran, Indonesia, Malaysia, Pakistan, Myanmar, India, Bangladesh and Singapore, the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Secretariat and international organizations in Geneva and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN between September 5 and 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people to achieve a final victory.
					
					 "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu", "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and other Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Polish Website
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might" was posted on the Polish website DPRK on September 9.
					 The work, published on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), says the invincible might of the DPRK lies in defending and adding eternal brilliance to the Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on nation-building and his feats.
					
					 Under the title "68th founding anniversary of DPRK" the website carried photos dealing with the feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in achieving the prosperity of the country and accomplishing the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Indonesian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Indonesian Paper
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- "4. For Global Independence" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was carried by the Indonesian internet paper RMOL on September 4 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 "4. For Global Independence" deals with the international circumstances of the Korean revolution and the achievements made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in the international relations during the period under review.
					
					 It also indicates the features of the international situation at present, the principled issue arising in realizing global independence, the foreign policy of the WPK and the tasks and ways of realizing it.
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Russian Media
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Russian media carried special write-ups and articles on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The paper Nizhegorodskaya Pravda No. 92 carried articles, illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DV-Ros News Service on September 7 said Kim Il Sung devoted himself to building socialism centred on the popular masses.
					
					 The internet news Erofei-Deve on the same day noted that the DPRK is a genuine people's country which puts their interests before anything.
					
					 Zebri Deve, online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, on September 6 praised the DPRK as an invincible socialist power.
					
					 Internet website Amur Pres on September 7 and 9 carried articles titled "Symbols of DPRK" and "One should properly understand DPRK".

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Bulgaria, Finland, Mexico
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Bulgaria, Finland, Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo and book exhibitions, film shows and art performances took place in Bulgaria, Helsinki and Mexico between September 7 and 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union praised Kim Il Sung for founding the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the union said the DPRK founded by Kim Il Sung in which the Juche idea is thoroughly embodied is a socialist country centred on the popular masses.
					
					 The international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League and the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the great leaders who founded the DPRK and strengthened it into a socialist state of Juche centred on the popular masses.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico noted that Kim Jong Un is leading to victory the struggle of the Korean army and people for building a socialist power, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Bulgaria and Finland.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Romania, Nigeria
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed in Romania, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, September 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the New Socialist Party of Romania and the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, a meeting, photo exhibition and film show by the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association and a photo and book exhibition by the Parida Hospital in Zamfara State, Nigeria on September 6 and 7 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos dealing with the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were books and photos introducing Juche Korea demonstrating its might as an invincible political and ideological power and military power.
					
					 Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" was shown.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, said September 9 marking the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK, a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense, is a significant holiday of not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy noted that the world-startling scientific and technological achievements have been made in the DPRK under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held by the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Portavoz de CNCDP llama a la lucha contra despliegue de THAAD
articles.content:
Portavoz de CNCDP llama a la lucha contra despliegue de THAAD
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Espantada por la exitosa prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la banda de Park Geun-hye trata de emplazar, tomandola como pretexto, el THAAD en el Sur de Corea.
					Diciendo que es una "circunstancia extremadamente grave al igual que el nivel de la situacion emergente del Estado" y "debe tomar la determinacion de acabar con el Poder norcoreano", la traidora Park fomenta la "crisis de seguridad" y la hostilidad a la RPDC, por una parte, y por la otra, maniobra astutamente para eliminar el clima de rechazo a THAAD en distintos sectores de la sociedad surcoreana abogando por la "disposicion de hacer frente rotundo".
					
					En la "reunion urgente para revisar la situacion de seguridad", el "Consejo de Ministros" y las conversiones con los representantes de los 3 partidos en el Poder y opositores, ella dijo que "se ve obligada a emplazar sin falta THAAD" y "lo impulsara mas rapido" y expuso la siniestra intencion de reprimir a los partidos opositores y los habitantes de diferentes sectores, que se oponen a la ubicacion del sistema antimisiles, calificandolos de "fuerzas malsanas" y "creadores de la inestabilidad social".
					
					En su declaracion fechada 15, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) apunto que lo susodicho demuestra a que grado llega la furia conflictiva anti-RPDC de la camarilla de Park.
					
					Tal comportamiento de ella no pasa de ser una fanfarronada de la que esta aturdida ante el desarrollo brusco de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, subraya el portavoz y continua:
					
					El emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea no salvara el destino de EE.UU. a punto de destruccion ni la pobre situacion de la banda de Park que mantiene su vida apoyandose en su amo gringo.
					
					Es imbecil y ridiculo el intento de defender con THAAD los minimizados, precisos y diversificados medios de ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Park debe actuar con prudencia al ver correctamente la posicion estrategica de la RPDC y reflexionar seriamente de las graves consecuencias.
					
					Le convendria a la banda traidora que escuche con seriedad nuestra advertencia de que la imprudente provocacion politica y militar causara solo el implacable fuego de armas nucleares que le conducira a la destruccion final.
					
					Todos los coreanos no deben perdonar jamas las tentativas de emplazar THAAD que impondran tremendo desastre nuclear en el territorio patrio.

articles.title: Inaugurado XV Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurado XV Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 16 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el XV Festival Internacional de Cine de Pyongyang.
					A la ceremonia inaugural asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vicepremier Ri Ryong Nam, Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura y presidente del Comite Organizador del Festival, Cha Hui Rim, presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim In Bom, viceministro de Cultura y titular de la Direccion General de Pelicula, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas, los creadores y artistas de la rama cinematografica, los trabajadores capitalinos, las delegaciones y delegados, participantes en el festival y los miembros del jurado internacional.
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, los agregados militares y los funcionarios encargados de asuntos culturales de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En el acto hubo la presentacion de las peliculas de ficcion de largo metraje, los documentales y cortometrajes expuestos en el festival y los filmes de proyeccion especial.
					
					En el discurso inaugural, Pak Chun Nam manifesto la conviccion de que el festival se efectuara exitosamente gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros y la cooperacion de todos los participantes.  
					
					Seguidamente, se izo la bandera del festival y se presentaron los miembros del jurado internacional. 
					
					Yuri Mityushin, presidente del comite de jurado internacional, pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					Expuso la voluntad de esforzarse mucho por consolidar el prestigio del festival a traves del desempeno eficiente de su comite. 
					
					Luego hubo la presentacion de los premios del festival.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes vieron la pelicula rusa "Puesto fronterizo tranquilo".
					
					El mismo dia, el comite organizador del festival ofrecio en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de los participantes.

articles.title: ACNC comenta terrorismo politico anti-Chongryon de autoridades japonesas
articles.content:
ACNC comenta terrorismo politico anti-Chongryon de autoridades japonesas
Pyongyang, 16 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Pasmados ante la exitosa prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear de caracter autodefensivo de la RPDC, los reaccionarios japoneses recrudecen la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon). 
					El mandatario japones chismeo que intensificara aun mas las medidas de sancion anti-RPDC y el partido gubernamental y los opositores coincidieron en aprobar una "resolucion de condena al Norte de Corea (RPDC)" en las camaras de representantes y consejeros.
					
					Todos los periodicos y las cadenas televisivas del pais isla infunden en la sociedad la opinion publica anti-RPDC divulgando articulos que critican a esta.
					
					Por otra parte, desde el dia 9, los gangsteres derechistas japoneses forman alborotos diariamente en los alrededores de la Casa Central de la Chongryon.
					
					Decenas de coches con altavoces, reunidos ante ese edificio, formaron un clima terrible gritando que "el cohete balistico norcoreano cayo en las aguas economicas exclusivas de Japon", "condenan la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear" y "expulsaran de Japon a la Chongryon".
					
					E incluso, mas de una decena de gangsteres intentan entrar por la fuerza en la Casa Central de la Chongryon formando grupos de varios hombres y recurren obstinadamente a la amenaza y chantaje contra esa organizacion coreana y los compatriotas residentes en Japon.
					
					Tal tumulto es un producto de la persistente politica hostil anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios japoneses y una farsa de los malhumorados ante el poderio de la RPDC que crece dia a dia bajo la bandera del Songun.  
					
					La gravedad reside en que el presente caso es una provocacion politica premeditada para manchar el prestigio y la imagen de la Chongryon, organizacion de compatriotas ultramarinos de la RPDC, e inculcar el ambiente conflictivo con esta en toda la sociedad japonesa al recrudecer el hostigamiento y la represion. 
					
					No se puede ocultar por nada la campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de los reaccionarios japoneses que vinieron fomentando y amparando de modo intencional y sistematico los alborotos de los gangsteres derechistas bajo el vistoso rotulo del "sentimiento del pueblo". 
					
					La nacion coreana esta muy indignada ante la actitud de ellos que en vez de pedir disculpas e indemnizar sus tremendos crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra los coreanos, recrudecen la represion anti-Chongryon enganando a la opinion publica como si ellos fueran "victimas".
					
					La represion anti-Chongryon no sera tolerada jamas porque es otro acto de violacion flagrante de la soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Nunca toleraremos el terrorismo politico y la persecucion de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon y los compatriotas en Japon y les enfrentaremos con la posicion intransigente. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben responsabilizarse totalmente del tumulto de los elementos derechistas, cesar de inmediato los continuos actos provocadores y castigar severamente a los responsables. 
					
					Observaremos atentamente el comportamiento posterior de las autoridades japonesas.
